sections.body:
Before Combat The mystic theurge casts bull's strength.

During Combat The mystic theurge casts haste and shield, then supports her companions with spells. She targets undead with channeled energy and searing light.

Base Statistics Without bull's strength, the mystic theurge's statistics are

Melee +1 spear +11 (1d8+5/×3)

Str 18

CMB +9

CMD 19.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: These theurges support righteous causes, especially ones that involve destroying undead.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Prestige Class NPCs/Mystic Theurge/Mystic Theurges/Celestial Theurge/Traica Kaladon

sections.body: The survivor of a zombie plague that ravaged her small town, Traica now quests to destroy any undead threat.
Allying with paladins, inquisitors, and clerics, Traica works to make the world safe for good people everywhere.
Gracious and kind, Traica is always willing to help the downtrodden.
